name: MormonNewsroom
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Include the Mormon Newsroom in your daily flash briefing!

This is an unofficial app created to help members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints stay connected and updated on latest LDS news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
